text: “Ezɨ nɨ garima, enselɨn mam Godɨn Nguibamɨn ikegha izaghira ghaze, ‘Nɨ temer kam okegh a gasɨghasɨkigh, egh an dakam ateghtɨ a nguazimɨn ikɨ. Egh ainɨn kokam ko bras inigh an povim gighuigh. Eghtɨ ghuariar dɨpaba dɨmangan gumazir kam giram, egh aneteghtɨ a 7plan azenibar asɨzir atiaba ko ikiam.’
